tort_general_negligence_claim.documentTitle: Statement of Claim for Extra-Contractual Damages (Negligence)
tort_general_negligence_claim.jurisdictionText: Arts. 2028-2061 of the Civil Code of 1960 (Liability arising out of fault).

facets.legalText: The Defendant committed a negligent act or omission that violated the general duty of care (Art. 2028).
The fault arose from a specific breach of traffic laws or other legal/regulatory duty of caution.
The Defendant is liable for the act of a minor, apprentice, or employee under their supervision or control (Art. 2085 et seq.).
The Plaintiff sustained bodily injury and incurred expenses for treatment, hospitalization, and rehabilitation.
The Plaintiff's property (e.g., vehicle, structure) was damaged or destroyed, requiring repair or replacement.
The Plaintiff suffered moral damage, including pain and suffering, emotional distress, and loss of amenity.
There is a direct and certain causal link between the Defendant's fault and the damage sustained by the Plaintiff (Art. 2034).
The Plaintiff has taken reasonable steps to mitigate and reduce the extent of the damages sustained.

reliefs.text: To order the Defendant to pay all costs incurred for medical treatment, hospital stay, and rehabilitation, in the amount of Birr [AMOUNT].
To order the Defendant to pay the cost of repairing/replacing the damaged property, in the amount of Birr [AMOUNT].
To order the Defendant to pay compensation for lost earnings and future loss of income due to permanent incapacity, in the amount of Birr [AMOUNT].
To award the Plaintiff compensation for moral damage (pain, suffering, and distress) in the amount of Birr [AMOUNT].

tort_strict_liability_buildings.documentTitle: Statement of Claim for Damages (Strict Liability for Buildings)
tort_strict_liability_buildings.jurisdictionText: Art. 2068 of the Civil Code of 1960 (Liability of the owner of a building).

facets.legalText: The Respondent is the owner of the building or structure from which the damage originated.
The damage was caused by the total or partial ruin of the building, which was due to lack of repair or a defect in construction.
The Plaintiff sustained bodily injury as a direct result of the building's ruin.
The Plaintiff's property was damaged as a direct result of the building's ruin.

reliefs.text: To order the Defendant to pay the cost of repairing the resulting property damage, in the amount of Birr [AMOUNT].
To order the Defendant to pay all costs incurred for bodily injury and treatment, in the amount of Birr [AMOUNT].
